storyInfo: The Hunters encounter AUS and realize that the town is under attack. Elysium is attacked by Ulpianus while protecting the town, and Specter runs into Amaia, believed to have been kidnapped.

attributes.content: Gran Faro is a tiny town, so small that most maps don't even bother to list it.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: But this is a request from Lord Carmen himself, and it involves Dr. Kal'tsit and those Ægir.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: If you still haven't found your answer, I will not give you permission to join the mission.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: I'd already made up my mind when I first decided to follow in your footsteps and become an Inquisitor.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Yes, before you even knew the question. An answer is worthless if it cannot explain what you see and hear.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: Don't die a worthless death, Irene. You know what we're fighting against. And you must find your own answer.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: Gladiia's tone does not change, but her footsteps reflect her mood.
A blink of the eye, and she is by Kal'tsit's side.
The Inquisition didn't do anything to you, did they?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The fact that Iberia has not yet sunk into the sea is proof that they still retain a shred of humility and vigilance.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You found a way, as promised.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Even if Iberia is willing to let go of their fears, what about Ægir?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If this temporary cooperation is necessary to help us return to the ocean... so be it.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Finally, an Ægir with some sense, right? Like the waves themselves, like the rays and texture of the sea.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Hello there, special Ægir. I believe you've already met our other members?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Yes. You're also a member of AUS?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Alty, bassist. Nice to meet you.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: The cultists are out in force, but individually they're rather weak.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: My Hunters can take care of everything.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The Inquisition will only work with us once we've taken care of the problems in Gran Faro.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then there's no time to waste.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: At the same time, she senses that something is not right.
There, among the Sea Terrors... but how could it be...?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: One of our operators is in trouble.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As we discussed, Alty, the members of AUS can stay ashore.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We'll handle this as quickly as possible.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And we'll be happy to provide some BGM for your campaign.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Ah... Skadi. Long time no see.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'm fine, just a little tired.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Yes... We're fighting, right? The scent of the ocean... reminds me of home.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The scent of the sea grows stronger. Are we home, Skadi? Is this the way home?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: ...It will be, Specter. Laurentina. I promise.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Tell me then... what's that before my eyes?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: A figure strides down the street, humming a tune.
The streets are a mess in the aftermath of the panicking townsfolk, but it hardly bothers Frost as she plucks at the air and imagines music.
The Sea Terrors keep away from her. No, they ignore her. Is she... playing an instrument?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Was it when we first met? No, he didn't even touch me.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Those documents must be destroyed, Iberian.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Obey, and you may keep your limbs. Attached, if you prefer.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Weren't your friends only burning them because there wasn't time to save them all?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: With your skills, you could just as easily have taken them yourself. So why the need to burn them?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The man growls from the bottom of his throat, a sound born of humiliation.
It doesn't concern you. Surrender the documents, and leave this place.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Whether you're with the Inquisition, or with another country...
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The mysterious Ægir gazes into the distance.
(Ægirian) We may be bound by blood, but you must stay away from Ægir for now.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Elysium evades the attack, but it's immediately clear why he managed to.
The sword's aura rips the charred papers to shreds, sending the splintered truth drifting into the wind.
(Ægirian) They cannot return to Ægir just yet. Allowing everyone to act on their own will only accelerate the destruction.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: (Ægirian) Even though Ægir has already chosen the path of self-annihilation.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Unsurprising numbers, for the coast. Now, where are you hiding?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Answer me. What do you intend for Gran Faro?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: That lantern! Get it off me—
attributes.name: Wounded Cultist

attributes.content: Carmen looks back in the direction that the cultist is indicating.
A statue stands in the middle of the square.
Gran Faro. The Great Lighthouse. Of course. You're seeking the lighthouse of Gran Faro.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The nobles once called those great monuments the Eye of Iberia. Dozens of them once stood on Iberia's coastline.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Even had the Witch King's Tower in Leithanien not been toppled, it would still have been dwarfed by these guardians of the sea.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: They are the single greatest mark that human civilization has ever left on this land.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The sea... *cough* the Eye of Iberia...
attributes.name: Wounded Cultist

attributes.content: The miracle... destroyed the sacrilege... argh... take that lantern away!
attributes.name: Wounded Cultist

attributes.content: The Profound Silence destroyed most of the lighthouses, and disabled the rest.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: You knew that one remained operational. That the goal of the Gran Faro project was to protect what was left of the Eye of Iberia.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: That's why you've been lurking here, awaiting your chance.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I never expected there to be traitors in the very heart of the Inquisition. Where are they?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Look under your feet... and come face to face... with your pathetic... narrow-mindedness...
attributes.name: Wounded Cultist

attributes.content: There is a familiar scent on you... Do you know what it is?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: A pleasant melody, but not the one that I know.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Then, how does the one you know go?
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: When she prayed, the stars ceased to shimmer♪
When she wept, the night let out a smile♪
When she laments, the anguish sprawled upon her madness♪
...A song of Ægir. A sad song.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: But I don't like it. It belongs in the past. It lacks passion, and wallows in futile sentimentality—the same as Ægir itself.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: In song, you will rediscover yourself.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Just sing. You will encounter your past. You must eventually find and face your destiny, or it will find you.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: That's how it has ever been, since I left the ocean.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: What a strange woman. But I don't mind singing.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: La la la, la la la♪
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: When she prays, the stars ceased to shimmer♪
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: As always, there's such sorrow in your song.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: I never imagined we'd meet again in such circumstances, Laurentina.
attributes.name: Amaia
